x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Improved donor management efficiency, real-time financial tracking, automated receipt generation, and transparent donation reporting — enabling nonprofits to focus more on mission delivery.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Nonprofits often face challenges managing donor information, tracking donations, and generating receipts manually. This leads to inefficiencies, data inaccuracies, and reporting delays.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow-based Donation Management System that integrates with CRM and Financial Management modules. It automates donor segmentation, manages donation campaigns, generates receipts, and provides dashboards for insights into donor activity and funding trends.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Financial Management
  • Customer Service Management (CSM)
  • Mobile App
  • Reporting/Analytics 
  • Integration with payment gateways and external CRM databases. 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data integration complexity and ensuring compliance with donation tracking and privacy regulations (GDPR).
